extendedInfo.description: Disease Care Guide is an Android application that works both for Mobile & Tablet. In this app we are providing you the information about the Major diseases.Disease care guide provides the details of major diseases that can happen to a human being. We tried to cover all the diseases, for this we divided human body into 9 categories and provided the complete information along with Cause, Symptoms, Precautions & First Aid information.A quick search option is available just to make find the things easy.This app will be very helpful for knowing about the diseases that can affect us.        âHuman life is very precious we knew it and we strive hard so that you can enjoy it with your loving onesâ.Keywords:HeartCancerKidneyBrainBonesLungsPregnancyStomachENTMajor DiseasesDiseaseHealth GuideHealthCareDisease Care Guide                                                                                                                            Powered By: BSP Software
